thread.title: Canes recall Rissanen to bolster defense
thread.title_full: Canes recall Rissanen to bolster defense

title: Canes recall Rissanen to bolster defense
text:
Canes recall Rissanen to bolster defense 
Posted 5:44 p.m. today Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Are you human? * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters 
Raleigh, N.C. â€” The Carolina Hurricanes on Tuesday recalled defenseman Rasmus Rissanen from the Charlotte Checkers. He'll join the team in Denver in time for Carolina's meeting Wednesday night with the Avalanche. 
Rissanen, 24, has one assist in four games for the Checkers so far this season. In 244 career games with the Checkers since he was drafted in 2009, he has 7 goals and 30 assists.
